text: Ara yate tini munaphika purusa o munaphika nari, musarika purusa o musarika nari yara allaha sambandhe manda dharana posana kare taderake sasti dena. Amangala cakra tadera upara'i [1] apatita haya. Ara allaha tadera prati rusta hayechena ebam taderake laâ€™nata karechena; ara tadera jan'ya jahannama prastuta rekhechena. Ara seta kata nikrsta pratyabartanasthala
